bill_title: require a waiting period if the voters reject certain school district bond issues.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to require a waiting period if the voters reject certain school district bond issues. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 13-19 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: If an election is conducted by a school district pursuant to chapter 6-8B and less than sixty percent of the voters voting upon the question do not vote in favor of issuing the school district bonds for a certain proposition, the school district may not submit a similar proposition to the voters for a period of six months. This section does not apply to any school district that is in the process of reorganization or consolidation. 750 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.016 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in House and referred to
Scheduled for Committee hearing on this date
